thread.title: Lost checked bags
thread.title_full: Lost checked bags - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Grand Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Karsten G
title: Lost checked bags
text: After check-out, I gave my bags to the hotel to hold for a few hours. Upon return, staff were unable to find them. I insisted to help with the search, and we went from room to room. Finally, we found my bags not in a storage facility, but in some guest room (not mine). What were my belongings doing in someone else's room? How did they get there?
